mapper.select: SELECT a.idx , a.member_idx AS memberIdx , b.game_idx As gameIdx , b.quantity , c.title AS gameTitle , c.price AS price , (c.price * b.quantity) AS cost FROM order_mt a INNER JOIN order_dt b ON a.idx = b.idx INNER JOIN game c ON b.game_idx = c.idx WHERE a.member_idx = #{memberIdx} ORDER BY b.sno DESC
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(c.price * b.quantity), 0) AS cost FROM order_mt a INNER JOIN order_dt b ON a.idx = b.idx INNER JOIN game c ON b.game_idx = c.idx WHERE a.idx = #{idx}
